about_the_game:
Dream Fallen is a remake of a game released 13 years ago. In addition to the remake, it also brings a continuation of the plot, changing some aspects of the game, such as gameplay and puzzles.

The game takes place in a well-known village and the objective is to solve all the tasks and stay alive to tell the story.

Each gameplay will have items scattered randomly, with the essential task of exploring drawers, cabinets and other interactive objects.

The player will be equipped with a flashlight that can be used to illuminate dark areas and remove shadow barriers.

The flashlight uses batteries that must be found and managed.

The village contains 6 missions, where each mission will be revealed based on cards that indicate their resolution.

The village is haunted, so the player can hide in cabinets, barrels and under beds to avoid confrontation.

Confrontation may be unavoidable, the flashlight can help you escape by using overcharging but this will also drain the battery faster.

You can light candles and hold some of them to help provide light.
